title: Update CRM After Client Event
description: An agent hosted a client appreciation party. They need to log attendance and notes in the CRM.

tasks.description: Take the list of attendees from the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all clients who attended.

tasks.description: For each attendee, log their attendance in their CRM contact record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Each relevant contact record is updated to show they attended the event.

tasks.description: Add any personal notes from conversations at the event (e.g., 'Client X mentioned their sister is looking to buy').
tasks.expected_outcome: Specific, actionable notes are added to the relevant contact records for future follow-up.
